headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Caterpillar After Its 68% 2025 Surge?
summary: Wondering if Caterpillar is still good value after its massive run, or if you would be buying in too late? You are not alone; this stock has been on a lot of watchlists lately. The share price has climbed about 4.8% over the last week, 6.0% over the past month, and an impressive 67.7% year to date, building on a 55.0% gain over the last year and roughly 270.0% over five years. Recent headlines have focused on Caterpillar as a key beneficiary of ongoing US infrastructure spending and global...
